Even if the subject material here is a fictional fucking isekai work, they always need to remind everyone about the bullshit. you yous are obsessed and can't let go of him because it's way too good business to keep bringing it up and play ultimate royal victims despite all your communal crimes across the world and ages, ditto with "raycissm". There is way too much to gain by nagging it up even if it's in no way related to the topic, whichever it may be, heck there aren't even any groids in that isekai harem romcom power fantasy with the typical jap mc.

@Toyue Emilia is considered attractive, but it's in the same way as you meeting Satan and thinking the devil is attractive. Satella is seen as that worlds Hitler/Satan/boogeyman. Elves in general are hated because of her. So it's not because she isn't pretty but that the witch is seen as this evil existence that destroyed half the world. Imagine if Hitler looked like a chad back when he was alive and then you met someone who was the spitting image of him today. Now imagine everyone is Jewish and sees a Hitler look alike walking about. That's Emilia's situation. It's not that she isn't attractive it's that she looks like evil incarnate.

@Whoever compares half-elf discrimination to Hitler: Simply put, you are putting up a wrong one. Hitler is hated and, according to some, somewhat objectively unattractive. Imagine an average racist who thinks Blacks are inferior to Whites but still wants some Black ass.
